official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to any enabling legislation which may arise concerning Puerto Rican Statehood.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any enabling legislation for the statehood of Puerto Rico should protect the ties with Puerto Rico which benefit all Americans.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to any enabling legislation which may arise concerning Puerto Rican Statehood.
